maml:description.maml:para: Add a Bind record to a Bind zone object
Add a Bind record to a Bind zone object

maml:Description.maml:para: The zone object to modify.
The record(s) to add to the zone.
Causes the added record(s) to be inserted after the record supplied to this parameter.
Pass through the record(s) to the pipeline for further manipulation.
The zone object to modify.
The record(s) to add to the zone.
Causes the added record(s) to be inserted at the index supplied to this parameter.
Pass through the record(s) to the pipeline for further manipulation.
The zone object to modify.
The record(s) to add to the zone.
Causes the added record(s) to be inserted before the record supplied to this parameter.
Pass through the record(s) to the pipeline for further manipulation.
Causes the added record(s) to be inserted after the record supplied to this parameter.
Causes the added record(s) to be inserted at the index supplied to this parameter.
Causes the added record(s) to be inserted before the record supplied to this parameter.
Pass through the record(s) to the pipeline for further manipulation.
The record(s) to add to the zone.
The zone object to modify.

command:example.maml:title: -------------------------- Example 1 --------------------------
command:example.dev:code: PS C:\> $Zone = Import-BindZone '.\contoso.com.zone' PS C:\> Add-BindRecordToZone -Zone $Zone -Record 'www 600 IN A 127.0.0.1'

dev:remarks.maml:para: Appends a www record to the end of the zone.

command:example.maml:title: -------------------------- Example 2 --------------------------
command:example.dev:code: PS C:\> $Zone = Import-BindZone '.\contoso.com.zone' PS C:\> $MxRecord = $Zone | Where-Object RecordType -eq MX | Select-Object -First 1 PS C:\> Add-BindRecordToZone -Zone $Zone -Record 'www 600 IN A 127.0.0.1' -Before $MxRecord

dev:remarks.maml:para: Adds a new A record before the first MX record.

maml:description.maml:para: Export a Bind zone object to a zone file
Export a Bind zone object to a zone file

maml:Description.maml:para: The zone object to export.
Path to export the zone to.
Path to export the zone to.
The zone object to export.

dev:remarks.maml:para: Exports a Bind zone to a zone file

maml:description.maml:para: Import a Bind zone file to a zone object
Import a Bind zone file to a zone object

maml:Description.maml:para: The literal path to the zone file.
The literal path to the zone file.
The literal path to the zone file.
The literal path to the zone file.

dev:remarks.maml:para: Import the contoso.com.zone file to a zone object.

maml:description.maml:para: Invoke the Sort method on the BindZone object
Invoke the Sort method on the BindZone object. This cmdlet exists just to make sorting more discoverable. You can also just call $Zone.Sort() for the same result.

maml:Description.maml:para: The zone object to sort.
The zone object to sort.

maml:description.maml:para: Create a new bind record object
Create a new bind record object from a string or parameters.

maml:Description.maml:para: The zone object to append the record to.
A commend for the record.
The host name of the record.
The record class of the record.
The record data of the record.
The record type of the record.
The TTL of the record.
A bind zone formatted record to convert to a record object.
The zone object to append the record to.
The zone object to append the record to.
A commend for the record.
The host name of the record.
A bind zone formatted record to convert to a record object.
The record class of the record.
The record data of the record.
The record type of the record.
The TTL of the record.

dev:remarks.maml:para: Create a new record for www.
Create a new record for www and append to the zone object contained in $Zone.
Create a new record for www.

maml:Description.maml:para: The zone origin for the zone object.
The bind record objects to append to the zone.
The zone origin for the zone object.
The bind record objects to append to the zone.

dev:remarks.maml:para: Create a new zone object for contoso.com.

maml:description.maml:para: Remove a record object from a zone object
Remove a record object from a zone object

maml:Description.maml:para: The zone object to modify.
The record object(s) to remove from the zone.
The record object(s) to remove from the zone.
The zone object to modify.

command:example.maml:title: -------------------------- Example 1 --------------------------
command:example.dev:code: PS C:\> $Zone | Where-Object RecordType -eq MX | Remove-BindRecordFromZone -Zone $Zone

dev:remarks.maml:para: Remove all MX records from the zone object $Zone.

maml:Description.maml:para: The record object(s) to modify.
Modify the record host name.
Modify the record TTL
Modify the record class.
Modify the record type.
Modify the record data.
Modify the record comment.
Put modified records on the pipeline.
Modify the record comment.
Modify the record host name.
Put modified records on the pipeline.
The record object(s) to modify.
Modify the record class.
Modify the record data.
Modify the record type.
Modify the record TTL

command:example.maml:title: -------------------------- Example 1 --------------------------
command:example.dev:code: PS C:\> $Zone | Where-Object RecordType -eq A | Set-BindRecord -TimeToLive 600

dev:remarks.maml:para: Set all A records to have a TTL of 10 minutes.

maml:description.maml:para: Test a zone against common issues

maml:Description.maml:para: The literal path to the zone file.
The path to the zone file.

The literal path to the zone file.
The path to the zone file.
The zone object to test.

dev:remarks.maml:para: Test the zone contained in the contoso.com.zone file.
